content: I am adding examples to Observation resource cover all the use cases we discuss in the resource introduction. http://hl7-fhir.github.io/observation.html
I need example data for the following:
fhir resource instances, data from reports or resultss

Imaging results like bone density or fetal measurements
Social history: tobacco uset, family supports, cognitive status any ccda to fhir examples instances?
Core characteristics: pregnancy status, death assertion
Thanks,
